html:
4.1.18  10:02 pm   Do you think Michael Jackson would still be highly revered if he didn't die?

     before he died, he had multiple guiness world records including Most Successful Entertainer of All Time, 24 Grammy Awards, 13 AMA awards (more than any other artist of all time), his Thriller album was the highest selling album of all time. He had won hundreds of awards (before dying), more than any other artist in the history of popular music. He shattered all kinds of records and was generally the most popular and successful entertainer/artist in the history of popular music. he reached legendary status well before the end of the 1980s and remained one of the most famous people on the entire planet, for the entire rest of his life. he touched some boys too but that's another story

     Like, do you have to die to be a lengend?

     no

4.1.18  9:48 pm   Hi Bill, it's me Bill, have you ever thought that maybe the reason why we don't find any aliens in the universe is because they've all left to a cooler funnier dimension and they're like there waiting for us?

     no

4.1.18  7:24 pm   is this the last question if april?

     no

4.1.18  7:10 pm   Why did you change the page after asking a question?

     i did not

     Was it for legal, and/or sexual reasons?

4.1.18  5:30 pm   What do you think of micro-tonality ?

      if you mean splitting each of the 12 half-steps exactly in half on purpose, then i am not interested

      Have you ever experimented with microtonal scales ?

     yes

4.1.18  5:20 pm   Have you been prankd yet today?

     i am a prank

4.1.18  5:01 pm   When typing on your phone, do you have a special keyboard installed that doesn't automatically capitalize the first word in every sentence?

     not necessary, you can turn off capitalize

      Or do you take the time to manually replace each capital letter for a lowercase one? Keep up the amazing work!

4.1.18  4:46 pm   Is this the first question of April?

     no

4.1.18  4:44 pm   Can I be a lesbian? I'm into guys, and I'm with one right now.

     you might have to fill out some paper work

4.1.18  4:44 pm   What do you think about Oxygen?

     oxygen

4.1.18  3:52 pm   do you watch superhero movies?

     i am trying to be the super hero

4.1.18  3:47 pm   if you had enough money to hire a team to help you create/edit things, what work would you keep doing yourself?

     writing

4.1.18  3:34 pm   "disappear" is listed on the expert page (dated 9.21.10), but this is just sheet music. did you ever record this one?

     yes but it's so terrible that i probably deleted the recording from all the sites

4.1.18  3:24 pm   What is the true meaning of Easter?

     the springtime

4.1.18  3:20 pm   cool. I press spacebar and the page shifts up a screen. u responsible for that?

     no, that's just a cool feature of the world wide web, in general

4.1.18  2:40 pm   Do you get enough sleep? I see you question get answered so early in the morning.
Hope you're doing well.

     the time i answer questions is not listed. i don't think you know exactly when i answer questions, but even if it is early in the morning then i still could have slept another time, such as early evening, night, late morning, early afternoon, and some other times as well

4.1.18  2:40 pm   what's your best april fools joke

     a different month

4.1.18  2:38 pm   how do you stick to who you are without being arrogant?

     there are some interesting mirrors you can use, if confronted

4.1.18  2:24 pm   Is this the first time 'why don't you use capital letters' was said in April?

     no

4.1.18  2:12 pm   What's your thoughts on the human race?

     seems like something that could really take off

4.1.18  2:08 pm   I've heard from many people that having perfect pitch doesn't help at all in music. But nothing can be useless, right? Is there anything perfect pitch can help with?

     bragging rights

4.1.18  1:28 pm   What are some competitive activities you enjoy?

     failure

     fair enough

     no

     you can

4.1.18  11:57 am   Am I cursed?

     yes, and blessed

      Are you cursed?

     yes, and blessed

4.1.18  11:52 am   3.31.18  9:44 pm what i mean like "song Song" there Is not in spotify and Youtube. so, i thInk yoU just wannA makE it dIffrent or you juSt wanna make peOple come over To see this web? 

     i didn't have access to spotify until 2015. as for youtube, i think it works best for videos. nowadays, i put all my new songs to spotify (and itunes, etc) and i also do a video for them, and put it on youtube

4.1.18  11:31 am   I really like bagels and cream cheese but I can't eat them because I have braces. It's been three years since I've eaten bagels. What do I do

      eat some non-bagels?

4.1.18  10:43 am   1,2,3,4,....?

     ah, i think i see where you are going with this

4.1.18  10:37 am   How to human?

     you are going to have to eat something

4.1.18  8:40 am   Is this the second question of april?

     no

4.1.18  7:50 am   when improvising, i feel like the scales are telling me what to play instead of me owning the scales!
how do i make that stop? 

     open up your palette to potentially include any note. then relax take a deep breath and try to ponder the entire universe at once

4.1.18  7:40 am   is this question random?

     i doubt it

4.1.18  7:19 am   what are your thoughts on april first

     it is the first day of the second quarter

4.1.18  6:43 am   Why do shades of paint have such weird names? Like Eggshell, Period Red, Effervescent Shitstain, and Mauve?

     that is to help you feel like a sophisticated adult

     no

4.1.18  4:54 am   I don't wanna be mean, but do u have friends?

     i don't want to have friends but are you mean

4.1.18  4:25 am   what's a person

     anyone

4.1.18  2:53 am   Would you ever consider working on voice synthesizers like Vocaloid?

     no

      Why/why not?

      i just don't need it, nor want it. i have nothing but the utmost respect for vocaloid and the vocaloid community, but it is just not something that is right for me, and i would prefer to do other things instead

4.1.18  2:31 am   but is this the first question of april?

     no

4.1.18  2:25 am   How do piano players play both handed. I'm relatively new to the piano scene and I find it difficult to play dual handed.

     just do what you can, and enjoy it. you will be amazed at how many small additions naturally manifest themselves, one by one

4.1.18  1:43 am   there should be a bill wurtz prime membership, and we get special acess to funky music and you mail us bananas every month

     it's hard enough making content for one audience, it would be counter productive to work on content for 2 separate audiences. it would slow everything down

4.1.18  1:30 am   it's not april fools day. haha april fools

     oh dang i always fall for that one

4.1.18  12:46 am   Does my life matter?

     does it matter to you

     I SPEND EVERY DAY WORKING AS FAST AS POSSIBLE WHAT ARE YOU DOING

     i was planning to let everyone else fool each other
